channel.title: before on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in before on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3: before releasing the big marble
item.description: 13:46 Tuesday 05 December 2017 JST I worked on MT3 in two parts today. Right around 2 hours total, I think, not including letting glue dry (during which I ate lunch and had a nice nap). I found a pretty good technique for keeping the large marble in place: using a twist tie looped around the track seems to do the trick. If I had taken the time to figure that out before I had the guy push the big marble up the M Splitter, he would have been able to walk up on both rails.

item.title: Chigasaki bound
item.description: ##11:15 Friday 14 November 2014 JST## I’m on the train headed to Soness’s house in Chigaski. She’s going to help me with ideas for teaching kids class on Wednesdays, and I’m going to help her with computer stuff. And we’ll get to catch up on life and hugs!
